data.title: Top Movies Like The Last Legion (2007)
data.meta_description: These are undefined similar movies we recommend that are like The Last Legion. Find great new films to watch next.
data.text:
1 . Gladiator

# 57 most popular movie yesterday

Gladiator is an iconic film set during the decline of the Roman Empire, featuring compelling characters and epic battles. For admirers of The Last Legion looking for a powerful story of revenge and redemption in ancient Rome, this is a clear standout.

7 movies like Gladiator ...

2 . A Knight's Tale

# 1,529 most popular movie yesterday

While lighter in tone, A Knight's Tale offers a charming and entertaining take on medieval times, complete with jousting and romance. If you enjoyed the adventure and period setting of The Last Legion, this humorous twist on age-old motifs could be your next favorite.

6 movies like A Knight's Tale ...

3 . Excalibur

# 1,569 most popular movie yesterday

Excalibur is a visually enchanting and dramatically rich retelling of King Arthur's rise to power. Like The Last Legion, it combines Arthurian legend with historical elements, making it a classic in the swords and sorcery genre.

6 movies like Excalibur ...

4 . The 13th Warrior

# 1,821 most popular movie yesterday

The 13th Warrior presents a clash of civilizations as a band of warriors face off against a mysterious threat. It shares The Last Legion's mix of historical setting and action-packed narrative, perfect for those who enjoy legendary warriors and mythic tales.

7 movies like The 13th Warrior ...

5 . King Arthur

# 2,135 most popular movie yesterday

King Arthur offers a gritty take on the Arthurian legend, mixing history with myth. If the blend of ancient history and sword-swinging action in The Last Legion appealed to you, this rendition of the iconic tale will undoubtedly captivate.

6 movies like King Arthur ...

6 . The Eagle

# 3,626 most popular movie yesterday

The Eagle explores the mysterious disappearance of Rome's Ninth Legion, much like The Last Legion delves into the fall of Rome. With a strong focus on honor and legacy, it's a must-watch for those who enjoy tales of ancient military valor.

6 movies like The Eagle ...

7 . Centurion

# 4,091 most popular movie yesterday

Set in ancient Rome like The Last Legion, Centurion is a savage and visually striking chase movie, telling the story of Roman soldiers fighting for survival behind enemy lines. Fans of historical warfare and epic battles will find it engrossing.

7 movies like Centurion ...
